attributes.review: Thanks tik tok for bringing me here the best app ever the orange Cheeto looks a little like the president THE president, notice how I didn’t say my or our because he isn’t my president, my president isn’t the worst person to ever walk this earth (tied with hitler)  I did not even open the app but I can tell that I would throw up if I did so thank you for showing the United States of America who you are so we could HATE you.

attributes.review: i don’t want to be a karen, but this app is disgusting. i opened it up and saw a picture of this really weird cheeto. my dog then threw up and now he hates cheetos(they were his favorite food). this app has tons of adds asking to text this creepy man??? no thank you. i’m sage and staying away from child predators. there was no way to get out of it. the whole point of this app was to make your own banners that say ____ for president 2020!! the only option was trump 😡😡😡i’m outraged at the money wanting people who had the audacity to make this app. waste of 5 minutes. please take off of app store or i might just have to switch to samsung. 🙄🙄🙄😡😡 -angry customer
attributes.title: horrid, don’t get

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to broaden my view on politics. It turns out that the app was created by a misogynistic, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, ugly, biased, pedophilic, child rapist, sex offender. I don’t know about you but I simply can’t support that. But by his logic, I guess that makes me a snowflake🤪. I’d rather be a “crybaby liberal” than a supporter of a man who tries to take away our rights when he gets fact checked on Twitter.
attributes.title: Hunter✝️🇺🇸😈🎣 is typing...

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and to my horror, there was no COINS no OBSTACLES, no monkeys chasing you through a temple, no subway surfing, what a horrible game! There was no music except these awful rambling speeches by some mentally ill ugly guy...I wish the developers would have designed a better app.... ‘‘twas only entertaining after many drinks... once the ugly man was blurry enough that I couldn’t get nauseous just by the sight of him.
attributes.title: sorry Donny
